description: Suitable for ANY fitness level Take a break from the conference sessions with an outdoor workout at the beautiful Victoria park! Expect a bit of everything: warmup squats pushups wontons chin-ups dips abs stretches // Find one misfit Feel free to: exercise with our coaches work out on your own keep your own pace (join / leave at any time) ************** Drinking water and high-protein snacks provided! ************** Supported by: Wirex - global payments platform serving both consumers and businesses, offering card-based payment products alongside card issuance and banking infrastructure for partners. For end users, Wirex provides payment cards and banking features designed for everyday spending. For businesses, Wirex offers Banking-as-a-Service APIs, card issuance, and payment rails that enable digital platforms to launch compliant, globally accepted card programs. Trusted by over 7 million users since 2014, Wirex has processed 20 billion in transactions across 130 countries. As a principal Visa and Mastercard member, it makes crypto spendable anywhere instantly and effortlessly. CTRL - non-profit community of open-source contributors. ************** Some of previous COW (Crypto Outdoor Workout) events: Devconnect Buenos Aires 2025: https://luma.com/10mc25n4 Token2049 Singapore 2025: https://luma.com/5zszm1qt NapulETH Naples 2025: https://luma.com/csb8kp9q EthCC[8] Cannes 2025: https://lu.ma/0poy12p2 ETH Belgrade 2025: https://lu.ma/fo6k71cz ETH Prague: htt...
